workflow_description: Research a topic on the web, synthesize findings, and write a short report.

workflow_inputs.input_description: How many top sources to review
File path to save the report on the VM

sequences.sequence_description: Search the web and collect top results for the topic.

steps.title: Open Browser and Search
actions: Search the web for: {topic} top resources
Review results and open the top {num_results} credible sources in new tabs.

steps.title: Skim and Extract Key Points
actions: For each opened source, skim content and extract 3-5 key points.

sequences.sequence_description: Summarize findings across sources into an outline and draft.

steps.title: Create Outline
actions: Create a short outline (Introduction, Key Findings, Trade-offs, Conclusion) tailored to: {topic}.

steps.title: Draft Summary
actions: Write a concise report (300-600 words) synthesizing the sources, with bullet points where helpful.

sequences.sequence_description: Write the final report to a file on disk.

steps.title: Save Report
actions: Write the final report to the file path: {output_path} in markdown format, including a Sources section with URLs.

code: async def run_this_workflow(sequences, topic, num_results, output_path):
await run_sequence(sequences, sequence_id='search_collect', user_inputs={'topic': topic, 'num_results': num_results})
